short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds and displays emails from the current page. And making it easy to copy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Parser is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed to help users extract, view, and manage email addresses found on any webpage. With a single click, users can retrieve all visible emails, copy them to the clipboard, and adjust their font size for easy readability. Perfect for marketers, recruiters, and researchers who need quick access to contact information, Email Parser provides a streamlined way to gather and organize emails without leaving the current page
